item.title: Basic Vocabularies of Taiwanese Hokkien
item.description: Pronouns Personal Hokkien English Translation Examples 我guá “I” 我合汝無合伊來往。You and I are not close to him. 阮guán/gún Exclusive “we”—us, but not you.Also used as genetive, “my,” “our” 阮臺灣儂。We Taiwanese.阮老爸。My dad. 㑑lán Inclusive “we”—you, me, and possibly others.Also used as genetive, “our” 恁是作武官，阮是作文官，㑑平平是政府其官吏。You are military officers and we are civilian officials, but we are equally officialdom of the government.㑑戍裏也有。We have it in our home, too.
